name: Stephen CROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Crooks v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Stephen CROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 18th day of May, 2000, probable jurisdiction is herewith noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
751 A.2d 181
Stephen CROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 19 M.D. Appeal Docket 2000.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 18, 2000.
